title: Stormlight Archives
author: Brandon Sanderson
description: "I feel each of the things you mentioned Sades," Dalinar said, eyes forward. "But I don’t always let them out. A man’s emotions are what define him, and control is the hallmark of true strength. To lack feeling is to be dead, but to act on every feeling is to be a child."

title: Cradle Series
author: Will Wight
description: “There are a million Paths in this world, Lindon, but any sage will tell you they can all be reduced to one. Improve yourself.”
